column1: The cream goes on quite smooth and leaves my face feelings refreshed
This product did provide overnight mosturization! I woke up with nice and shiny skin! It just felt great! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Creams made me sweat it all off. This gel is amazing

Was using regenerist and was sad I wasn't getting the results I wanted, fortunately I stumbled upon the oil of Olay skin advisor, it asks what your concerns are and you take a selfie. Well they recommended this and I'm seeing results already at 1 week. Do yourself a favor and take 5 minutes to complete the skin advisor. You won't be disappointed.

I really like how the product works into the skin immediately-no greasy feeling! It smells fresh and I can see my skin is better moisturized and I feel real happy about that! Moisturized but I do not feel like an oil slick!
Thank you! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product feels great, both when applying it to my skin and while wearing it. It is not heavy at all, like some facial moisturizers. I like how easy it is to apply and then how my face absorbs the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I didn't notice any smell however it feels amazing and absorbs quickly into my skin. In such a short period of time, it's made a great difference in the appearance of my 67 yr. old skin! I've bought very expensive facial creams and I believe this measures up or excels! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I do like the feel of this product. Haven't actually been using it long enough to know for certain how much it is moisturizing. It seems to be a nice, light moisturizer. I'm just not one to go with scents, so I probably wouldn't continue with this product unless I do see some amazing results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

HA is the it ingredient for anti-aging products right now...and it's not cheap. Olay's version is affordable. While I love the lightweight and smoothness of the gel, the smell is a little overpowering. I don't think I've used it long enough to see lasting results on my lines and dark spots, but thus far, it's done a great job in providing moisture to my skin (esp. during these dry summer months). [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It looks and smells like thick laundry detergent. It was alarming how similar this smells to Tide, not something I felt excited about putting on my face. It works moderately well, moisturizes adequately but a bit greasy for a gel moisturizer. I picked this up for $4 clearance. I can see, no, smell why. I've used gel moisturizers before and wanted to give Olay a shot. Not great.

This Olay hydrating gel moisturizer was so light and refreshing. It absorbed quickly into the skin without feeling sticky or gunky. The scent was light and pleasant without being overwhelming. My skin felt soft and smooth, even in the morning. I look forward to seeing results of continued use! Big fan! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is amazing, it made my face feel and look so much more smooth and has even started helping with discoloration on my face, which nothing has helped with in the past. The gel goes on smooth and a little goes a long way! It is definitely worth purchasing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really enjoy using this gel moisturizer. It feels light, not sticky, and absorbs quickly into the skin. My skin had a softer feel after using the product for only a few days. It's like a little pampering in a jar and we all need a little pampering. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the way this feels on my skin, and it does seems to smooth my skin a little better than my regular Regenerist in the red jar. I live in a very hot and humid climate, and this is perfect for Summer. Highly recommend [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the way this moisturizer glides on and has a light feel to it. It is not heavy. It also has a nice scent and does not leave the face shiny. However, it does not seem to last throughout the day for me. I have dry skin and need something heavier. I usually use Olay Regenerist. Also, this product does NOT contain SPF. I would probably purchase this product but not use it everyday or maybe just use it at night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This produce is very soft and goes on smooth. You only need a very small amount. It has a very nice scent. And it takes the dryness away. I haven't used it long enough to see a difference in my wrinkles but will continue to use it. I like it very much. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Olay Age Defying ADVANCED Gel Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid is worth every penny. Leaves your skin soft like it use to. I'm 72 but my skin says I'm a lot younger.

Ive been looming for the right product for bags under eyes an fine lines. I really like this products over time i started seeing changes it was making... Help with the the eyebags took them awAy [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Just bought and used tonight. Not impressed. My skin doesn't feel hydrated kind of feels like rubber and definitely not radiant. After I write this I will be putting on a different moisturizer.
I have been using it for several weeks, and I see the difference. It is not greasy, lightweight, and smooth. Also, it is not an expensive one. I would highly recommend it!
I am a HUGE buyer of Olay ... especially of the Anti-Aging items ...i MUST be their target audience .... thanks OLAY ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Great product-Effective Really works-priced at a value compared to other products Olay a name you can trust to perform [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product feels soft on skin and it smells great. It is very light and did not cause my face to break out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
light weight and feels good on the skin but I only use moisturizers with spf so I would be reluctant to buy it for that reason otherwise I love it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Like the packaging I think the feel is nice, i dont know if it is completely effective at removing wrinkles [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have oily skin so this gel works great for me. I use it just at night because there's no sun screen in it. I also haven't had any acne break outs, so thats always a good thing [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product is great, it absorbs into the skin quickly and is not greasy on the skin. I am looking forward to see my results after extended use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the way it feels on my face. Its not sticky. Rubs in easily. No greasy feeling. Don't need to use a lot of this product on the face. I use it on my neck and chest as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It has a cooling effect when applied. Not greasy, absorbs well. Fragrance not too bad.
I like it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Makes skin soft and smooth to the touch I looked forward to using everyday works better than more expensive moisturizers. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I usually buy a Lancôme face products. But I found this one to work much better than Lancôme at a much better price. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is so lightweight on your skin. It feels really nice and as a bonus has a pleasant smell. I have older skin and love the way this makes my skin feel. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Moist to the touch. Feels good on skin. Have only used it a couple days, but it seems to help with moisturizing my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
A little goes a long way! Only need a small amount to cover face, soaks in instantly. Feels wonderful! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This new moisturizer feels silky going on without any stickiness or heavy feeling on your face. fabulous! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

When I first applied this product, it felt amazing. It didn't feel oily, it felt smooth and gave me a nice glow. Yes, I will be purchasing this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product feels great and is easily absorbed into my skin. I believe my skin looks better and feels more healthy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is silky to the touch as you are putting it on your face. It leaves your face with a lovely sheen and looks hydrated all day long in this Texas heat.. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I thought at first this may be too greasy. Not at all! It feels so nice and leaves my skin feeling amazing. It doesn't feel heavy at all. Cool and refreshing. My skin loves it too! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Really like this product. Moisturizers make my skin radiant and glowing Only drawback is it has no sunscreen. Have to add sunscreen before I walk in morning in Arizona. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
